title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: RFK Jr.'s picks for CDC vaccine advisers meet this week amid controversy
items.description: For the first time since Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. replaced all the members of the vaccine committee, it is meeting in Atlanta.

items.title: Brutal Temperatures Expected for Many on Wednesday, but Relief Is Near
items.description: After days of record-breaking heat, some cooling is expected in the Eastern United States starting Thursday.

items.title: Greetings from Odesa, Ukraine, where a Black Sea beach offers respite from war
items.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares snapshots of moments from their lives and work around the world.

items.description: The decision means that Britain’s air force will have a nuclear role for the first time since the end of the Cold War.

items.description: The move, one official said, would help the country extradite suspects from abroad. It would also spare the life of a recently convicted tycoon.
